comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/qzwlinux>@qzwlinux</denchmark-link> : This error may because the storage-user has no content. The storage data should be created, but since no user, the folder on target machine was not created. You can just ignore the error and continue to create storage user data. <denchmark-code>python storagectl.py user setdefault <your user name> teamA </denchmark-code>
We will fix this in our next version.
